item.title: How to download your TikTok data in case the app goes dark
item.description: Some TikTok users are preparing for the likely ban by downloading their data. Here's how to do it.

item.title: Woman says she lost $850,000 to scammers posing as Brad Pitt
item.description: The woman said she had believed she was in a romantic relationship with the Hollywood star, leading her to divorce her husband and transfer $850,000.
